a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Primary energy consumption by source, World
Energy consumption is shown as primary energy equivalents in terawatt-hours (TWh). This means this does not
correct for fossil fuel inefficiencies in coversion to final energy estimates.
Source: BP Statistical Review of Global Energy (2019)
Note: 'Other renewables' includes geothermal, biomass and waste energy.
